level.heading: Regulations.
level.text: The Mayor shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2.

level.heading: History
level.text: (June 19, 1934, ch. 672, ch. V, ยง 28, as added Mar. 14, 1985, D.C. Law 5-160, ยง 3(h), 32 DCR 39.)

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 5-160
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-160, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 31-4725.
